title: Anthropic buys Super Bowl ads to slap OpenAI for selling ads in ChatGPT
description: Feb 7 (Reuters) - Anthropic ‌is spending millions of dollars to air commercials during Sunday night's National Football League championship game to slam rival OpenAI for its plan to ‌sell ads on its ChatGPT chatbot, in one of the biggest public spats between the big artificial-intelligence companies.

title: The new cola wars are upon us-but this time it’s the battle of AI
description: Anthropic’s anti-ChatGPT Super Bowl ads could instigate a win-win scenario for artificial intelligence—but OpenAI has to respond in kind.

title: AI beyond Earth: Musk says Artificial Intelligence will shift to space in 30-36 months
description: Elon Musk predicts a dramatic shift in how and where AI computing will be hosted not on Earth, but in orbit. The SpaceX and xAI boss says space could soon become the most cost-effective home for artificial intelligence due to energy limits on our planet.
content: Elon Musk, the billionaire behind SpaceX, Tesla and xAI, has once again turned heads with a bold prediction about the future of artificial intelligence. During a recent interview, Musk said that within the next 30 to 36 months, space will become the ... [2235 chars]

title: Private equity’s giant software bet has been upended by AI
description: The artificial-intelligence revolution has the private capital markets concerned about investing in software businesses.
content:

title: Artificial intelligence transforming software engineering jobs, warns Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei
description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei has warned that software engineering could become obsolete within the next 12 months as AI systems take over most coding work. Now, Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu has reiterated the warning, saying it should not be ignored given that Anthropic already builds some of the most advanced AI tools for coding.
content: If there is one job that is feeling the impact of artificial intelligence most acutely, it is software engineering. Much of the core work, particularly coding, is increasingly being handled by AI systems. IT giants like Google, Amazon and Microsoft a... [2613 chars]
